entries.title: Mercedes-Benz Plans to Build U.S. Electric Car Charging Network
entries.description: The network could help increase the low number of charging stations, encouraging more people to buy electric vehicles.

entries.title: New York Attorney General Sues Founder of Collapsed Crypto Bank
entries.description: New York Attorney General Letitia James accused the founder of Celsius Network, Alex Mashinsky, of a scheme to defraud hundreds of thousands of investors.

entries.title: Ford Sales Dipped in 2022, but Electric Vehicle Deliveries Surged
entries.description: The company’s production was limited by a global chip shortage but it made big gains in the fastest-growing segment of the auto market.

entries.title: Amazon Expands Corporate Layoffs to 18,000 Jobs
entries.description: The layoffs will focus on human resources and its retail division, Amazon’s chief executive said in an email to employees.

entries.title: Tesla Sales in China Slump as Competition Intensifies
entries.description: Worry about the carmaker's sales in the world's largest car market is one reason the shares have plunged.

entries.title: A Breach at LastPass Has Password Lessons for Us All
entries.description: The hacking of the password manager should make us reassess whether to trust companies to store our sensitive data in the cloud.
